metadata.title: My First Cafe
metadata.author: Claude
metadata.summary: A student visits a cafe for the first time with a friend and enjoys trying new drinks and cake.
metadata.summaryJapanese: 学生が友達と初めてカフェに行って、新しい飲み物とケーキを楽しみます。
metadata.audioPrompt: Read aloud clearly and slowly for language learners:
